<script>

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', async function() {

    window.searchData = searchData;

  // é«˜äº®å…³é”®è¯
  function highlightKeywords(text, keywords) {
    if (!text) return '';
    let result = text.replace(/</g, '&lt;').replace(/>/g, '&gt;');
    keywords.forEach(kw => {
      if (kw.length < 2) return;
      const regex = new RegExp(`(${kw.replace(/[.*+?^${}()|[\]\\]/g, '\\$&')})`, 'gi');
      result = result.replace(regex, '<span class="search-highlight">$1</span>');
    });
    return result;
  }
  
  // æ‰§è¡Œæœç´¢
  function performSearch(query) {
    const lowerQuery = query.toLowerCase();
    const keywords = lowerQuery.split(/\s+/).filter(k => k.length >= 2);
    let results = [];
    
    searchData.forEach(item => {
      const title = (item.title || '').toLowerCase();
      const text = (item.text || '').toLowerCase();
      const section = (item.section || '').toLowerCase();
      const desc = (item.description || '').toLowerCase();
      
      let match = false;
      if (currentSearchFilter === 'all') {
        match = keywords.some(kw => title.includes(kw) || text.includes(kw) || section.includes(kw));
      } else if (currentSearchFilter === 'title') {
        match = keywords.some(kw => title.includes(kw));
      } else if (currentSearchFilter === 'content') {
        match = keywords.some(kw => text.includes(kw));
      } else if (currentSearchFilter === 'abstract') {
        match = keywords.some(kw => desc.includes(kw) || section.includes(kw));
      }
      
      if (match) {
        let snippet = '';
        const searchText = currentSearchFilter === 'abstract' ? (item.description || item.text || '') : (item.text || '');
        const lowerSearchText = searchText.toLowerCase();
        const idx = lowerSearchText.indexOf(keywords[0]);
        if (idx >= 0) {
          const start = Math.max(0, idx - 20);
          const end = Math.min(searchText.length, idx + 80);
          snippet = (start > 0 ? '...' : '') + searchText.substring(start, end) + (end < searchText.length ? '...' : '');
        } else {
          snippet = searchText.substring(0, 80) + '...';
        }
        results.push({
          title: item.title,
          section: item.section || '',
          href: item.href,
          snippet: snippet
        });
      }
    });
    
    results = results.slice(0, 8);
    
    // æ¸²æŸ“è¿‡æ»¤æ å’Œç»“æœ
    const filterBar = `
      <div class="search-filter-bar">
        <button class="search-filter-btn ${currentSearchFilter === 'all' ? 'active' : ''}" data-filter="all">å…¨éƒ¨</button>
        <button class="search-filter-btn ${currentSearchFilter === 'title' ? 'active' : ''}" data-filter="title">æ ‡é¢˜</button>
        <button class="search-filter-btn ${currentSearchFilter === 'content' ? 'active' : ''}" data-filter="content">å†…å®¹</button>
        <button class="search-filter-btn ${currentSearchFilter === 'abstract' ? 'active' : ''}" data-filter="abstract">æ‘˜è¦</button>
      </div>
    `;
    
    if (results.length > 0) {
      const resultItems = results.map(r => `
        <a href="${r.href}" class="search-result-item">
          <div class="result-header">
            ${r.section ? `<span class="result-section">${highlightKeywords(r.section, keywords)}</span>` : ''}
            <span class="result-title">${highlightKeywords(r.title, keywords)}</span>
          </div>
          <div class="result-snippet">${highlightKeywords(r.snippet, keywords)}</div>
        </a>
      `).join('');
      searchResults.innerHTML = filterBar + resultItems;
    } else {
      searchResults.innerHTML = filterBar + '<div class="search-result-item"><div class="result-snippet">æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°åŒ¹é…çš„ç»“æœ</div></div>';
    }
    searchResults.classList.add('visible');
    
    // ç»‘å®šè¿‡æ»¤æŒ‰é’®äº‹ä»¶
    searchResults.querySelectorAll('.search-filter-btn').forEach(btn => {
      btn.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        e.stopPropagation();
        currentSearchFilter = btn.dataset.filter;
        performSearch(searchInput.value.trim());
      });
    });
  }
  
  // ==================== å†…å®¹æ ‡ç­¾åˆ‡æ¢ ====================

  // Fisher-Yates æ´—ç‰Œç®—æ³•

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // ç­‰å¾…æœç´¢æ•°æ®åŠ è½½å®Œæˆåå†æ„å»ºä¾§è¾¹æ 
  setTimeout(() => {
    const marginSidebar = document.querySelector('#quarto-margin-sidebar');
    if (!marginSidebar) return;

    const isSectionPage = window.location.pathname.includes('/sections/');
    const resolvePath = (path) => {
      if (isSectionPage) {
        if (!path.startsWith('sections/')) return '../' + path;
        return path.replace('sections/', '');
      }
      return path;
    };

    const customSidebarContainer = document.createElement('div');
    customSidebarContainer.className = 'custom-sidebar-cards';

    const quickLinksHtml = `

        <div class="sidebar-card-header"><span class="header-icon">ğŸš€</span> å¿«æ·å…¥å£</div>
        <div class="quick-links-grid">
          <a href="${resolvePath('0001-guide.html')}" class="quick-link-item" title="å­¦ä¹ è·¯çº¿"><span class="emoji">ğŸ—ºï¸</span><span class="text">è·¯çº¿</span></a>
          <a href="${resolvePath('sections/packages.html')}" class="quick-link-item" title="å®ç”¨RåŒ…"><span class="emoji">ğŸ“¦</span><span class="text">RåŒ…</span></a>
          <a href="${resolvePath('sections/visualization.html')}" class="quick-link-item" title="å¯è§†åŒ–"><span class="emoji">ğŸ¨</span><span class="text">ç»˜å›¾</span></a>
          <a href="${resolvePath('sections/statistics.html')}" class="quick-link-item" title="ç»Ÿè®¡æ–¹æ³•"><span class="emoji">ğŸ“</span><span class="text">ç»Ÿè®¡</span></a>
          <a href="${resolvePath('sections/machine-learning.html')}" class="quick-link-item" title="æœºå™¨å­¦ä¹ "><span class="emoji">ğŸ¤–</span><span class="text">ML/AI</span></a>
          <a href="${resolvePath('sections/operation.html')}" class="quick-link-item" title="å®ç”¨æ“ä½œ"><span class="emoji">ğŸ› ï¸</span><span class="text">å®æ“</span></a>
        </div>
      </div>
    `;

    // æ¯æ—¥æ¨èå¡ç‰‡é€»è¾‘ - æ”¯æŒå¤šä¸ªæ¨èå’Œåˆ·æ–°
    let recommendationHtml = '';
    const data = window.searchData || [];
    const filteredData = data.filter(item => item && item.title && item.href && item.title.length > 0);
    
    // è·å–éšæœºæ¨èï¼ˆä¸é‡å¤ï¼‰
    function getRandomItems(arr, count) {
      const shuffled = [...arr].sort(() => Math.random() - 0.5);
      return shuffled.slice(0, Math.min(count, arr.length));
    }
    
    // æ¸²æŸ“æ¨èå¡ç‰‡
    function renderRecommendations(container) {
      if (filteredData.length === 0) return;
      
      const items = getRandomItems(filteredData, 3); // æ˜¾ç¤º3ä¸ªæ¨è
      const cardsHtml = items.map((item, idx) => `
        <div class="recommend-item" data-index="${idx}">
          <span class="recommend-tag">${item.section || 'ç²¾é€‰'}</span>
          <a href="${item.href}" class="recommend-title">${item.title}</a>
        </div>
      `).join('');
      
      container.innerHTML = `
        <div class="sidebar-card-header">
          <span class="header-icon">ğŸ¯</span> éšæœºæ¨è
          <span class="refresh-btn" title="æ¢ä¸€æ‰¹" id="refresh-recommendations">ğŸ”„</span>
        </div>
        <div class="recommend-list">
          ${cardsHtml}
        </div>
      `;
      
      // ç»‘å®šåˆ·æ–°æŒ‰é’®äº‹ä»¶
      const refreshBtn = container.querySelector('#refresh-recommendations');
      if (refreshBtn) {
        refreshBtn.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
          e.preventDefault();
          e.stopPropagation();
          refreshBtn.style.transform = 'rotate(360deg)';
          setTimeout(() => {
            refreshBtn.style.transform = 'rotate(0deg)';
            renderRecommendations(container);
          }, 300);
        });
      }
    }
    
    // åˆ›å»ºæ¨èå¡ç‰‡å®¹å™¨
    const recommendCard = document.createElement('div');
    recommendCard.className = 'sidebar-card recommendations';
    
    customSidebarContainer.innerHTML = quickLinksHtml;
    customSidebarContainer.appendChild(recommendCard);
    
    // æ¸²æŸ“åˆå§‹æ¨è
    if (filteredData.length > 0) {
      renderRecommendations(recommendCard);
    }
    
    const toc = marginSidebar.querySelector('#TOC') || marginSidebar.querySelector('nav');
    if (toc) toc.after(customSidebarContainer);
    else marginSidebar.appendChild(customSidebarContainer);
  }, 500); // ç­‰å¾… 500ms ç¡®ä¿æœç´¢æ•°æ®å·²åŠ è½½
});
</script>
